articles.title: Volkswagen's $5 bln investment in Rivian boosts EV maker's shares - Reuters
articles.description: German automaker Volkswagen Group will invest up to $5 billion in U.S. electric-vehicle maker Rivian as part of a new, equally controlled joint venture to share EV architecture and software, the companies said on Tuesday.
